data.title: Derry City live score, schedule & player stats
data.meta_description: Derry City live score, fixtures, player ratings and statistics.
data.text:
Derry City live scores, players, season schedule and todayâ€™s results are available on Sofascore.

Derry City next match

Derry City will play the next match against Cork City on Aug 16, 2024, 6:45:00 PM UTC in FAI Cup.

When the match starts, you will be able to follow Cork City vs Derry City live score, standings, minute by minute updated live results and match statistics.

We may have video highlights with goals and news for some Derry City matches, but only if they play their match in one of the most popular football leagues.

Derry City previous match

Derry City previous match was against Dundalk FC in Premier Division, the match ended in a draw (1 - 1).

Derry City fixtures tab is showing the last 100 football matches with statistics and win/draw/lose icons.

There are also all Derry City scheduled matches that they are going to play in the future.

Derry City performance and form graph is a Sofascore unique algorithm that we are generating from the team's last 10 matches, statistics, detailed analysis and our own knowledge.

This graph may help predict future Derry City matches.

Current Derry City players

Forward: Pat Hoban, Danny Mullen, Colm Whelan Midfielder: William Patching, Daniel Kelly, Michael Duffy, Jordan McEneff, Sadou Diallo, Adam O'Reilly, Paul McMullan, Patrick McEleney, Jacob Davenport, Ronan Boyce, Tiernan McGinty, Luke O'Donnell, Callum McKay, Glenn McCourt Defender: Ben Doherty, Mark Connolly, Daithi Mccallion, Ciaran Coll, Cameron Dummigan, Shane McEleney, Conor Barr, Sam Todd, Aaron Heaney Goalkeeper: Brian Maher, Tadgh Ryan, Evan Ovendale

The current Derry City roster, stats and player performance can be found on this page.

There are also statistics for each player in all competitions with all total played and started matches, minutes played, number of goals scored, number of cards and much more.

Derry City top scorers list is updated live during every match.

You can click on players from the roster above and see available personal information such as nationality, date of birth, height, preferred foot, position, player value, transfer history etc.
